preface.title: Foreword: ${project.version}
preface.para: This book covers both Nexus Open Source and Nexus Professional, a product which brings full control and visibility to organizations which depend on Maven repositories to manage releases and distribute software. You are encouraged to check http://books.sonatype.com/nexus-book weekly for any updates to the content. If you would like to receive updates whenever there is a change to this user's manual, please send a quick note to support@sonatype.com, and we will gladly add your email to the update notification list.

We welcome your feedback, please do not hesitate to contact the Sonatype team with any questions or ideas you may have about the product. We're focused on making the adoption of Nexus Open Source and Nexus Professional painless, and we are here to do anything we can to help speed up the learning curve associated with some of the more advanced and powerful features of Nexus.

If you have any feedback or questions, you are encouraged to post an item in our Get Satisfaction page for this book: http://www.getsatisfaction.com/sonatype/products/sonatype_repository_management_with_nexus.

section.title: Changes in Edition 2.4.1
section.para: The following changes were introduced in Edition 2.4.1 in June, 2010:

listitem.para: Changed the Table of Contents in the ePub edition of the book. The presence of a large, detailed Table of Contents at the beginning of an eBook seems redundant when you use a reader with a built in index. Based on initial testing with the iBook reader on an iPad, it was decided to reduce the length of the Table of Contents. In this version, the table of contents only displays chapter titles. (NXBOOK-471)
Added a cover to the ePub version of the book. (NXBOOK-472)
Checked code and programlisting line widths. Lines do not wrap when font is on normal within the iBook reader. (NXBOOK-474)

Added Completed Docbook metadata (authors, publish date, abstract, publisher information). This changes improves metadata display in ePub readers. (NXBOOK-476, NXBOOK-484, NXBOOK-482, NXBOOK-481, NXBOOK-483, NXBOOK-479, NXBOOK-480, NXBOOK-477)
